thread.title: Motorcyclist 'thrown through garden fence' after crash in Southampton
thread.title_full: Motorcyclist 'thrown through garden fence' after crash in Southampton

title: Motorcyclist 'thrown through garden fence' after crash in Southampton
text:
A MOTORCYCLIST was thrown through a garden fence when he was in collision with a car in a Southampton estate. 
The man was rushed to hospital after crashing into another vehicle in Wimpson Lane at 7.40am today. 
The impact hurled him from his bike through a fence and into a front garden. Share article 
He was taken to Southampton General Hospital by ambulance but it is not known the extent of his injuries. 
A passerby who was taking his granddaughter to college said: “Paramedics were attending to a person lying in the front garden of a house in Wimpson Lane. There was a motorbike lying on its side in the next garden and police in attendance.” Promoted Stories A motorcyclist has been taken to hospital after he was thrown through a garden fence following a crash in Millbrook   Keep in touch with local news
